name: Forged Puzzles
description:
Forged Puzzles is a image matching game with a  3x3 play board (for now).
 Use the Left Mouse Button to interact with the pieces, SPACE BAR to
continue once you complete the image and ESC to exit the game.

As it is in early access, sometimes the last two pieces can be missplaced by the engine, but don't worry, you will win anyway if the rest of the pieces match!

 Thank you for supporting my work by playing and/or visiting my Facebook Page: Myths Forger.
 Have a good day! :D
